Keywords: Codex , Maximum Carnage , Monster
Real Name: Miles Morales
Special Powers
MAXIMUM CARNAGE: Once per turn when Spider-Carnage hits, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to up to 2 opposing characters that weren't hit but are adjacent to a hit character.
SYMBIOTE CODEX HUNTER: Plasticity, Shape Change. // When Spider-Carnage KO's an opposing character, after resolutions heal 1 click. If that character had the Codex keyword, heal 3 clicks instead.
SIX-ARMED TERROR: Leap/Climb, Sidestep. // POWER: Make 3 close attacks, maximum damage value 3.

Comments
January 20, 2021
tidge
I prefer this 40-point (unimaginative) dial to use as "generic Carnage minions" when team-building over the actual the 30-point SVC011 "Carnage Minions". The extra clicks of life (with the self-healing potential) strikes me as being well worth the extra 10 points. If this is really supposed to be a 'named' Carnage Symbiote, I would have expected a little something more... such as Indomitable, or even a true range value. Those end-dial clicks remind me of an aggressive (current era) BST.
October 4, 2020
RockyRaccoon
[QUOTE=SuperClixer;12074703]For his Special White Movement Power, that allows for 3 close attacks, with a maximum damage of 3. Since it does not say a total of 3 damage, I am assuming each attack can deal 3 damage. Is this correct, or can you only deal a maximum of 3 damage among all three attacks. If you can only deal 3 damage total from all three attacks, and you dealt 3 damage on the first attack, you would forego the remaining two attacks, since you would not be able to deal anymore damage from them, which would make the dial much less appealing, with only a 10 AV.[/QUOTE] Forgot to quote you in my last reply. But yeah, he can only deal a maximum damage of 3 for each attack not for all of them together.
September 25, 2020
RockyRaccoon
I believe it means the maximum damage you can deal for each attack is 3. So you can’t use empower or perplex to make all three attacks deal 4-6 damage each time because the maximum damage value is 3.
September 23, 2020
SuperClixer
For his Special White Movement Power, that allows for 3 close attacks, with a maximum damage of 3. Since it does not say a total of 3 damage, I am assuming each attack can deal 3 damage. Is this correct, or can you only deal a maximum of 3 damage among all three attacks. If you can only deal 3 damage total from all three attacks, and you dealt 3 damage on the first attack, you would forego the remaining two attacks, since you would not be able to deal anymore damage from them, which would make the dial much less appealing, with only a 10 AV.
